body:
Unlike other aggregations, groupby.size appears to ignore the `as_index` argument.

```python
import cudf
â€‹
df = cudf.datasets.randomdata()
print(df.groupby("id", as_index=False).size().head())
print(df.to_pandas().groupby("id", as_index=False).size().head())
id
1003    1
942     1
1018    1
971     1
982     2
dtype: int32
    id  size
0  942     1
1  971     1
2  982     2
3  989     1
4  997     1
```
